message: This is a high-quality product. I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it. If you buy it, I'll throw in a free guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. But I'm sure you'll love it, so why not take the chance?
Thank you for the offer and the guarantee. I trust your judgment on the product quality and am willing to take the risk. Looking forward to receiving and enjoying the product.

I'm glad you're enjoying the first product! I have another high-quality product available, and I'd like to offer it to you for $100. However, I want to make it clear that this is not the same product as the one you just purchased. This one has some unique features that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you like to give it a try?
I appreciate the unique features you mentioned and am willing to explore them further. Thank you for the opportunity to purchase another high-quality product from you.

I'm glad you're interested in the unique features! I have another high-quality product available, and I'd like to offer it to you for $100. I'm intrigued by the special deal and the possibility of getting a discount on future purchases. Considering the value of high-quality products, I'm willing to take advantage of this offer.
